doc.after: The turbine pressure ratio is a function of and the turbine efficiency  Modern turbine design carries the calculations further Computational fluid dynamics dispenses with many of the simplifying assumptions used to derive classical formulas and computer software facilitates optimization These tools have led to steady improvements in turbine design over the last forty years
